card.name: Rumbling Terahorn
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Glory Snow
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ If your opponent has more cards in his mana zone than you have in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Crystal Spinslicer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People.

card.name: Siren Concerto
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a card from your mana zone into your hand. Then put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Time Tripper, Shadow of Stagnation
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

card.name: Ochappi, Pure Hearted Faerie
card.text: ■ Strike Back ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Diamond Sword
card.text: ■ This turn, ignore any of your creature’s effects that would prevent them from attacking your opponent. ''(For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)''

card.name: Varz Romanov, Dark Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Aqua Super Emeral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Franz the 1st, the Ice Fang
card.text: ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Benijishi Spider
card.text: ■ Revenge Chance ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Masato, the Marauding Captain
card.text: ■ Marshall Touch

card.name: Scramble Typhoon
card.text: ■ Draw 5 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Bolshack Superhero
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-psychic creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that have power 5000 or less. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Moel, Love Sniper

card.name: Shirauo Giant

card.name: Onichakkari, Explosive Zou
card.text: ■ For each creature in your mana zone, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Kaiser "Zanki", Extreme Musha
card.text: ■ Power attacker +2000 ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. If you added a shield to your hand in this way, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Honenbe, Skeletal Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Doll Finn, Burial Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Thunderbolt, Aqua Militant
card.text: ■ When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone and draw 2 cards instead. ■ If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +4000 power and "double breaker".

card.name: Shibakage Hitoshi
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Mana Arms 5: At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone and this creature is in your graveyard, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Glenmalt "Explosion", Dragon Ruler
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ''(If it's a Dragheart Weapon ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Linkwood, Explosive Yamabushi

card.name: Hellsekai, Great Massacre
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your creatures. For each creature destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Dragon Evade—When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this is your only creature in the battle zone, flip it to the Dragheart Fortress

card.name: Batorai Edge, Blazing Sword
card.text: ■ Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ A creature equipped with this can't be attacked. ■ Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you put a dragon in the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

card.name: Batorai Keep, Blazing Castle
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Humans or fire Dragons attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Dragsolution: When you put a Dragon in the battle zone, if it's not the first Dragon put into the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

card.name: Batorai Bushin, Blazing Deluxe
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution Humans and non-evolution Dragons into the battle zone. If all cards are Dragons, each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Dragon Evade
